abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said it had completed a series of investments in Ma Anshan Modern Farming, a Chinese dairy farm company.
snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said it had completed a series of investments in Ma Anshan Modern Farming, a Chinese dairy farm company.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said it had completed a series of investments in Ma Anshan Modern Farming, a dairy farm company based in the central Chinese province of Anhui, Reuters reported.

headline.main: K.K.R. Announces Stake in Chinese Dairy
